page.title: 10Before school in Bridlington
page.content: 7:05am my alarm goes off, so I drag myself out of bed, crawl across the room and switch it off. Then I go back to bed! 7:20am I decide to get up, stagger to the bathroom have a wash and wake myself up. 7:30am I decide to get dressed which usually takes 15 minutes. 7:45am I go into the kitchen, let the dog out and collect the milk from the doorstep. By this time the rest of the family are up. This time is usually chaotic, so I take my breakfast into the living room and watch TV. 8:10am I brush my teeth and get my books ready for school. 8:25am I set off for school, I walk to my friend's house, arriving there about 8:40, we wait for another friend and walk to school together.
